title: The Scale of Galio's rework
body:
In the Riot post sent out earlier today regarding all things rework-related, it was said that Galio's rework would be of the biggest transformation of a champion to date. Does this mean that it will be a bigger change than even Sion's rework? 
I mean, when you think about it, I don't think one of Sion's old abilities were kept. The only thing similar was his name, and of course skins.

 I may be mistaken though, as I barely have knowledge of his old self.

Anyway, is this the treatment we can expect Galio to be given? A completely new set of abilities and playstyle? Or could there have been a slight exaggeration...
